name: Guide
description: Equip 2 Wearables at the same time
creator: The Red Tide

name: Two's Company
description: Escape with a Companion by your side
creator: The Red Tide

name: Full Stomach
description: Use 3 Consumables on yourself
creator: Hass Thrift

name: Sneaky
description: Conceal 3 Unfriendly Entites on the Field of Play
creator: The Red Tide

name: No-Clip Surprise!
description:
During the no-clip round, deal the first 8 cards face
down followed by the next 8 cards face-up (as normal)
with 4 cards in your DIH. The face down cards will act
as surprises. When uncovered, reveal the card beneath.
If it's an entity and there are currently no entities being
engaged, you must engage the revealed entity. If it's an
item and you have not picked up an item during the round,
you must add it to your inventory. If you deck out, you
must deal the cards as a no-clip surpise again.
creator: Hass Thrift

name: Max Sanity Intact
description: You must have 20 Sanity before escaping the Backrooms
creator: Hass Thrift

name: Full Backpack
description: Escape the Backrooms with 4 items in your Inventory
creator: NowayArtemus

name: Dissolving Painite
description: If you have a Painite Gem when you reveal the Exit Card (Golden Stairs/Golden Exit/Etc), flip your gem. If it lands Movement Side up, you lose it.
creator: NowayArtemus

name: Unyielding Focus
description: When you deck out, engaged Entities stay engaged and do not get shuffled in with the rest of the cards
creator: NowayArtemus

name: Empty Pockets
description: You must escape the Backrooms with no items in your Inventory. You cannot discard an item without using it or exchanging it.
creator: NowayArtemus

name: Hoarder Mode
description: When using an item, lose 1 Sanity in addition to any normal Sanity effects
creator: Halcyon was Here

name: They Grow or Somethin'
description: Items with 5 Attack or higher take up two item slots.
creator: RestedKnight

name: Resourceful Wanderer
description: Use 4 different types of consumables before escaping.
creator: The Red Tide

name: Experienced Explorer
description: Use 3 Unique Attack Items before exiting.
creator: NowayArtemus

name: Strategic Exit
description: Successfully complete the game without using any consumables.
creator: The Red Tide

name: Three's a Crowd
description: Have 3 different companions before exiting.
creator: NowayArtemus

name: Fearless
description: Defeat 4 different Entities before escaping the Backrooms.
creator: NowayArtemus

name: Sanity Cap
description: You cannot exceed 20 Sanity. If your Sanity were to exceed 20, deduct your Sanity cost instead of adding it. For example, if you had 18 Sanity and moved into Hallway with +3 Sanity, then you would end up with 15 Sanity.
creator: Hass Thrift

name: Woke Up and Chose Violence
description: Shuffle X Unfriendly Entities into your deck. You must defeat X number of these entitites before escaping.
creator: Support Flamingo (Albert)

name: Brink of Insanity (Lvl 1)
description: You cannot escape the Backrooms with more than 10 sanity
creator: Hass Thrift

name: Pain Mode
description: Engaged Unfriendly Entities deal one more DIH damage every round and reduce one extra sanity upon engagement
creator: NowayArtemus

name: Entity Exterminator
description: Defeat 6 different Entities before escaping the Backrooms.
creator: The Red Tide

name: Ravenous Void
description: Navigation Points placed onto an Unfriendly Entity or a Permanent Fixture go into the Discard Pile
creator: Halcyon was Here

name: Small Pockets
description: You only have 3 Inventory slots
creator: Halcyon was Here

name: Super Hoarder Mode
description: When using an item, lose 2 Sanity in addition to any normal Sanity effects
creator: Halcyon was Here

name: Don't Let Them Follow You
description: (All hostile/dual entities need to be gem eligible) Do not have any gem eligible entities on the FOP or Engagement when you escape. If they see you use a gem to escape, they may learn how to follow you back to reality. Dont doom the world you fought to return to.
creator: Passing Wanderer

name: Purity of the Gem
description: When exiting the Golden Stairs (of the Lobby Levels) flip the painite gem. If it lands gem up, you escaped. If it doesnt, you lose the gem and you can not pass. The gems purity was not good enough to break the barrier.
creator: Passing Wanderer

name: Gatekeeper Guardian
description: When the Golden Stairs or Golden Exit card is revealed on the FIeld of Play, search the Pull Pile and then discard for the first Unfriendly entity of at least Red or Higher rarity, then place it on top of the Exit Card. You must defeat this entity to be able to access the escape. If this entity would be discarded for any reason besides being defeated in combat, shuffle the Golden Stairs/Exit into the Pull Pile.
creator: NowayArtemus

name: Enemy Territory
description: You may only have 1 Friendly/Dual type entity in your deck. The rest must be Unfriendly Entities.
creator: fr33b33

name: Overwhelming Forces
description: Have 2 Portal to Death cards in your deck as well as an exit card. Remove 1 room card of your choice before the start of the game.
creator: Dacsinu

name: Brink of Insanity (Lvl 2)
description: You cannot escape the Backrooms with more than 5 sanity
creator: Hass Thrift

name: You Can't Run!
description: With the exception of the no-clip round, if any entity is revealed in the FOP and there are no entities currently engaged then you must either engage them immediately or use an item to distract them (if possible). If multiple entities are in the FOP at the same time, you may choose which one to engage first. Once an entity is defeated and there are other entities in the FOP, you must immediately engage with the next one the following round.
creator: Hass Thrift

name: Light at the End of the Hallway
description: Place the Golden Stairs at the end of your Pull Pile. Do not shuffle the Golden Stairs with the rest of the Pull Pile. When your Pull Pile is empty and the Golden Stairs is in your DIH, reset the board and attempt to escape!
creator: Hass Thrift

name: Avoid Them!
description: You must escape the Backrooms without engaging with any Unfriendly Entities. If you must engage with an Unfriendly Entity, you lose.
creator: Support Flamingo (Albert)

name: Beastly Powers
description: Each Entity that holds a Painite Gem has double health
creator: NowayArtemus

name: Maximum Painite
description: You must loot two Painite Gems in one game. Upon defeat, these Entities enter your Inventory and take up an Inventory slot.
creator: NowayArtemus

name: Fearless Exterminator
description: Defeat 8 different Entities before escaping the Backrooms.
creator: The Red Tide

name: Bleeding Out (Week One)
description: Escape the Backrooms with 4 DIH or less
creator: NowayArtemus

name: Enemy Territory
description: You may only have Unfriendly Entities in your deck. Friendly and Dual types are banned
creator: fr33b33

name: One of Everything
description: You must escape with a companion, a consumable, an attack item, and a wearable item.
creator: NowayArtemus

name: Purple Light District
description: All hostile entities in your deck must be purple light or higher
creator: Dacsinu

name: Red Light District
description: All Red Light or higher entities in your deck must be Unfriendly.
creator: NowayArtemus

name: The Terminator
description: Defeat 10 different Entities before escaping the Backrooms.
creator: The Red Tide

name: Near Obliteration
description: Escape the Backrooms with 1 Sanity and 1 DIH
creator: NowayArtemus

name: Brink of Insanity (Lvl 3)
description: You cannot escape the Backrooms with more than 1 sanity
creator: Hass Thrift

name: Maximum Painite Madness
description: You must loot three Painite Gems in one game. Upon defeat, these Entities enter your Inventory and take up an Inventory slot.
creator: NowayArtemus

name: Time Trial
description: Escape the Backrooms in 20 min or less
creator: The Red Tide

name: Time Trial
description: Escape the Backrooms in 15 min or less
creator: The Red Tide

name: Time Trial
description: Escape the Backrooms in 10 min or less
creator: The Red Tide

name: Time Trial
description: Escape the Backrooms in 5 min or less
creator: The Red Tide

name: What are the odds?
description: Roll a d20 dice to choose your starting sanity. If you start with 16-20 Sanity, this is worth 1 Point. 11-15 Sanity is worth 2 Points. 6-10 Sanity is worth 3 Points. 1-5 Sanity is worth 4 Points.
creator: Hass Thrift

name: Souvenir
description: Exit the Car Park with the Key Card in your Inventory.
creator: NowayArtemus

name: Unprepared
description: Visit the Painite Toll Booth without having a Painite Gem.
creator: NowayArtemus

name: Be Prepared
description: Have a full Inventory when you enter the Destroyed Lot.
creator: NowayArtemus

name: Mindless Wandering
description: Enter 4 rooms that cause you to lose Sanity.
creator: NowayArtemus

name: Upside down Smile
description: Defeat 2 Smilers before exiting the Car Park.
creator: NowayArtemus

name: Way Found
description: Cover 2 entities using the Wayfinder.
creator: NowayArtemus

name: For the Road
description: Have 2 Skits in your Inventory when you exit.
creator: NowayArtemus

name: Potent Recall
description: Find and use the Memory Fluid to re-arrange the Field of Play.
creator: NowayArtemus

name: Calling All Creatures
description: Shuffle 2 Unfriendly Entities into your DiH using the Echoing Intercom.
creator: NowayArtemus

name: Ponder the Orb
description: Use the Navigator's Orb 3 times before exiting.
creator: NowayArtemus

name: Wyrm Whisperer
description: Tame the Memory Wyrm.
creator: NowayArtemus

name: Calming Compass
description: Use the Old Bronze Compass and put 1 Entity on the bottom of the Pull Pile.
creator: NowayArtemus

name: Invaders from Afar
description: Have Enforcers summon X entities before you escape. Each Entity is worth 1 point, maximum 4. Gain 1 extra point if you defeat all summoned entities.
creator: NowayArtemus

name: Do You Like... My Car?
description: Defeat up to three entities that are in the Cursed Toy Car.
creator: Groyer

name: Removing Alert status!
description: Discard two entities using the Echoing Intercom.
creator: Groyer

name: Scurry Away, Little Man
description: Engage a Death Rat with no hostile entities on the field, causing it to instantly run.
creator: Groyer

name: My dude, what are you doing?
description: Engage the Wayfinder... and cover an unfriendly Entity with another one.
creator: Groyer

name: Vending Visit
description: Interact with the Vending Room twice, once by using a Key Card and once by paying a Painite Gem
creator: NowayArtemus

name: Killer Smile
description: Defeat 3 Smilers before exiting the Car Park.
creator: NowayArtemus

name: Friendly Neighborhood Moth
description: Add two items to your Inventory through Death Moth engagements.
creator: NowayArtemus

name: Itching for Items
description: Have 3 items in your Inventory when engaging a Hoarder
creator: NowayArtemus

name: Nearly Hexed
description: Defeat a Hex Doll with 5 or less cards in your Deck in Hand.
creator: NowayArtemus

name: Death Rat Hijinks
description: Engage a Death Rat when there are at least 3 other entities on the Field of Play.
creator: NowayArtemus

name: Step on it!
description: Defeat a Jhkix before it escapes after 3 rounds.
creator: NowayArtemus

name: Treasure Regained
description: Gain a Red Light or higher item back from the Discard pile after defeating a Minus Moth.
creator: NowayArtemus

name: Turncoat Behavior
description: Engage a Turncoat when there are at least 5 rooms on the FOP.
creator: NowayArtemus

name: Kodak Moment
description: Defeat the Security Kiosk twice, using unique methods each time.
creator: NowayArtemus

name: Ride 'em Cowboy!
description: Tame the Scarlett Wyrm
creator: NowayArtemus

name: Friend Turned Foe
description: Engage Aiden twice, once as a friendly entity, and once as an unfriendly.
creator: NowayArtemus

name: Roadtrip Munchies
description: Have 3 Skits in your Inventory when you exit.
creator: NowayArtemus

name: Can't Give it Up
description: Return the Hex Pipe to your Inventory twice before exiting.
creator: NowayArtemus

name: Gives you Wings
description: Defeat an entity using the Death Moth's Brew as the final attack.
creator: NowayArtemus

name: Battering Ram
description: Deal at least 10 damage with Shopping Carts before exiting.
creator: NowayArtemus

name: Flair for Days
description: Place out 4 cards using the Road Flares.
creator: NowayArtemus

name: That Little Bastard!
description: Engage with a Red Light or higher entity when the Cursed Toy Car appears on the Field of Play.
creator: NowayArtemus

name: Like Clockwork
description: Place 4 cards onto the bottom of your DiH using the Clockwork Torch.
creator: NowayArtemus

name: Dressed for Success
description: Keep the Reflective Vest on for 3 rounds while engaged to an entity.
creator: NowayArtemus

name: Save Yourself!
description: Shuffle 2 Friendly Entities into your DiH using the Echoing Intercom.
creator: NowayArtemus

name: Mental Burdens
description: Lose at least 5 Sanity using Oliver's ability while he is your companion.
creator: NowayArtemus

name: Heed the Call!
description: Shuffle 4 Unfriendly Entities into your DiH using the Echoing Intercom.
creator: NowayArtemus

name: Spin and Crash!
description: Defeat an enemy in the Cursed Toy Car using only Oil Slick Shrooms.
creator: Groyer

name: Need Some Gas?
description: Defeat an enemy in the Cursed Toy Car using only Petrol Shrooms.
creator: Groyer

name: Wyrmymon Battler
description: Tame a Wyrm and defeat another Wyrm with it using no other attack items.
creator: Groyer

name: Can I Keep It?
description: Tame a Wyrm and have it in your Inventory when you enter the Golden Exit.
creator: Groyer

name: Back-To-Back
description: Defeat an Enforcer, then engage and defeat the entity it summoned by the end of the next Action Round.
creator: BiggestSmilerFan

name: Blurred Mind
description: Use the Memory Fluid 3 times before exiting.
creator: NowayArtemus

name: Smudged Vision
description: Use the Smudge Pot on 3 unique entities.
creator: NowayArtemus

name: Toxic Relationship
description: Lose 5 extra Sanity using the Petrol Shrooms from using them over 5 turns,
creator: NowayArtemus

name: One Begets the Other
description: Use a tamed Wyrm as a weapon against an Ancient Wyrm. Gain 1 extra point if it's the final blow to defeat the Ancient Wyrm.
creator: NowayArtemus

name: Sight Seeing
description: Engage and defeat an entity in every Lot type (Abandoned, Desolate, Destroyed)
creator: NowayArtemus

name: Tamer of the Ancients
description: Tame an Ancient Wyrm
creator: NowayArtemus

name: Photo Finish
description: Defeat the Security Kiosk 3 times, once with the Key Card, once paying a Painite Gem, and once by engaging it.
creator: NowayArtemus

name: Ancient Eyes Upon You
description: Enter at least 3 rooms while engaged with the Ancient Tollkeeper
creator: NowayArtemus

name: Shop Til They Drop
description: Deal at least 8 damage in a single attack using the Shopping Cart
creator: NowayArtemus

name: Ticket Fiasco
description: Have 2 Cursed Parking Tickets in your Inventory at the same time.
creator: NowayArtemus

name: Nerfed!
description: Use the Oil Slick Shrooms on 3 entities with at least 3 Attack/DiH Damage

name: Sour Luck
description: Find no items when using the Abandoned Backpack.
creator: NowayArtemus

name: Abundance
description: Find 2 items using the Abandoned Backpack before you escape.
creator: NowayArtemus

name: Outta the Way!
description: Be engaged with a red light or higher entity when the Shadow Lurker is revealed and engages you on the Field of Play.
creator: NowayArtemus

name: Master of Monsters
description: Tame 2 unique Wyrms.
creator: NowayArtemus

name: Shop Till You Drop!
description: (LV 1-4): Exit with at least 1 item in your Shopping Cart (min. 1). Gain up to 4 points, 1 point per item when you leave to a Max of 4.
creator: Groyer

name: A Knife in the Dark
description: Engage & defeat a Turncoat when at least 6 of the cards on the FoP are Rooms for at least one turn.
creator: Groyer

name: Something Truly Evil
description: Engage & defeat a Hex Doll when your DiH is at least 19.
creator: Groyer

name: Back to the Lobby
description: Use the Lift to exit the Car Park and enter the Lobby Levels.

name: Search for the Cube
description: Find and use the B.S.C.O.S. Device

name: Freeing the Frowner

creator: NowayArtemus

name: Hoarder Mode
description: When using an item, lose 1 Sanity in addition to any normal Sanity effects

name: Feeding the Hounds

name: Choke Out

name: Death Moth Delivery

name: Death's Door
description: Use 2 Death Shrooms before exiting.
creator: NowayArtemus

name: Prism Pain
description: For each level, the Golden Stairs must be moved once before an escape can be made. Each time the stairs are moved, you must pay a Painite gem gathered from a unique source (each entity is unique, as is each room). At the max level, 5 gems have to be brought back to the stairs before exiting.
creator: Dacsinu

name: Hopper Hunter
description: Send an Entity to the Discard Pile using Hopper Device

name: You Monster! 5

name: Ambush!

name: Who's Laughing Now?

name: Cutting Corners

creator: LuckyLogan

name: Evolving Horrors
description: SETUP: Place an Ancient Faceling into the NLD Zone before the game begins. CHALLENGE: Defeat the Faceling and then the Ancient Faceling before escaping. Once you defeat the Faceling, instead of placing it in the discard pile, set it aside out of play and shuffle the Ancient Faceling into the Pull Pile from the NLD Zone, and continue playing.
creator: NowayArtemus

name: Drained Dry
description: At the start of every Action Round that you're engaged to an entity, lose 1 Sanity.
creator: Unknown

name: Aiding Aiden
description: Before escaping, you must engage with Aiden at least twice. One of those times, you must give him a Painite Gem.
creator: Unknown

name: Backrooms Hit List
description: Defeat 4, 6, or 8 different unique entities before exiting. 4 entities are worth 1 Point, 6 entities are worth 2 points, and 8 entities are worth 3 points. Use a die or tokens to track each time you defeat a unique entity.
creator: Unknown

name: Dark Hall Aficionado 1
description: Defeat 2 Entities while in a Dark Hall for 2 points
creator: Unknown

name: Dark Hall Aficionado 2
description: Defeat 3 Entities while in a Dark Hall for 3 Points.
creator: Unknown

name: Bright Hall Maestro 1
description: Defeat 2 Entities while in a Bright Hall.
creator: Unknown

name: Bright Hall Maestro 2
description: Defeat 3 Entities while in a Bright Hall.
creator: Unknown

name: Hole-ding Out
description: Defeat an entity, then use Shrink Drink to go through a Punctured Wall. Moving through the Punctured Wall must happen the next movement round after defeating the entity.
creator: Unknown

name: Wave of Hypnosis
description: Engage and defeat 3 Monitors.
creator: Unknown

name: Wandering Warrior
description: Engage and defeat a Green light or higher entity in each hallway type (i.e. Poisoned, Dark, Bright, Destroyed). For each unique Hallway type you defeat an entity in, gain 1 Point.
creator: Unknown

name: Unnatural Strength
description: All Unfriendly entities deal double Deck-in-Hand damage while engaged.
creator: Unknown

name: Sapping Sanity
description: All items cost an additional -2 Sanity to use, on top of any regular Sanity loss.
creator: Unknown

name: Extra Juicy Fruit
description: Use Dumb Gum on 3 different entities. This Gum is a powerful weapon in the backrooms, allowing you to put the dangerous unfriendlies down before they get you!
creator: Unknown

name: White Elephant Party for the Arch-Raven
description: Gift the Arch-Raven Death Moth Jelly during two separate encounters to gain its favor. This bird loves to give gifts, and also endlessly desires its favorite jar of Death Moth Jelly.
creator: Unknown

name: Paper Snake Party
description: Engage the Paper Snakes and sacrifice a Painite Gem and an item to it over one or more encounters. These don’t need to be in the same encounter. Even the Paper Snakes get some holiday cheer!
creator: Unknown

name: Truly Empty Pockets
description: Escape the Backrooms without any items in your inventory. Items may not be discarded unless actively used or discarded due to taking a fifth item. To embody the spirit of giving, you must leave as light as you came, Wanderer.
creator: Unknown

name: Starving Void
description: Lose 2 items from your Inventory to the Void before escaping. The Void is hungry for a helping of presents, so give it what it wants to appease its bottomless appetite.
creator: Unknown

name: Clocksmith's Holiday Treasury
description: Gain a total of 4 items from encounters with the Clocksmith. This mysterious fella often has nuggets of wisdom to dispense, as well as some valuable items should you choose to leave him with his Painite Gem.
creator: Unknown

name: Turning the Frown Upside Down
description: Use Memory Fluid to appease a Frowner Entity during two separate encounters. Even the Frowners need love this holiday season, so appease their mind with some Memory Fluid cologne and let their sorrows fade into holiday cheer.
creator: Unknown

name: The Entity Next Door (L2)
description: Whenever you lose DIH to an Entity while engaged, your Sanity drops by the same amount. Every engagement in this place drains both your mind and your body. Prepare yourself to suffer, but through suffering, find your salvation!
creator: BigTasty
